name: Sleepless (Magssss)
description:
Overview

Sleepless is a first-person puzzlegame with Thriller elements.

The game contains collectable items and captivating puzzles. 

The gameplay and atmosphere is inspired by "The Room" and "What Remains of Edith Finch".

Controls

W,A,S,D - Walk

I - Inventory

P - Phone

Strg - Crouch

Shift - Sprint

Esc- Pause

The Team

Bengisu Arbaz - Project Lead

Anja Kortmann - Artist - https://dreamless-ghost.itch.io/

Jan Wassermann - Lead Programmer

Tim Rantzau - Lead Designer - https://rollingtr.itch.io/

Kevin Hoxha - Lead Artist - https://kevkev7557.itch.io/

Leon Bißdorf - Programmer

Max Nedbal - Programmer - https://magssss.itch.io/
